remarks: The kernels of nonzero functionals are hyperplanes.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Jul-2014.)
statement:
lkrshp3.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lkrshp3.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lkrshp3.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` D ) $.
lkrshp3.h $e |- H = ( LSHyp ` W ) $.
lkrshp3.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lkrshp3.k $e |- K = ( LKer ` W ) $.
lkrshp3.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lkrshp3.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lkrshp3 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( K ` G ) e. H <-> G =/= ( V X. { .0. } ) ) ) $.
